attributes.action: make it a legal requirement for all bike riders (motor and pedal) horse riders and drivers to wear hi-viz/flouorescent wear
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being easily and quickly seen by motorists when using the highway is a necessity in order to save lives. It is proven that the wearing of high visibility/flouorescent wear greatly increases the early detection of riders of motor/pedal bikes and horses. We therefore request it be made a legal requirement for these users, when on the highway, to wear a minimum of a reflective/flouorescent tabard.
